basicInfo.name: Yuri
basicInfo.flavor: Yuri joined Evan's Crew in an effort to stop Bane and Kris's coalition. She seems very happy to be at Evan's side again.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Landing a Critical Hit has a 100% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Energy Drain
Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 285% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 340% of Magic Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 29% Magic Damage Boost. [Duration: 5 Turn(s)]

Skill 2.name: Magic Orb
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals Defense-Ignoring damage equal to 285% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals additional damage equal to 170% of Magic Attack against targets inflicted with [Burn].
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 340% of Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Fox Charm
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Crit Rate Boost to 27%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Revives with 80% HP upon falling in battle. [1 Time(s) per Battle]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Evan, Karin, Evan Expedition, fruit wine, fried scorpion, freedom, fun
profile.dislikes: Leo, fish, things that don't change, boredom
profile.story: The extended exposure to the desert has altered the 500-year old fox Yuri's coat color. She possesses surprisingly great powers and abilities.

basicInfo.name: Yuri
basicInfo.flavor: Yuri returned from her adventure as the strongest among all three-tailed foxes. With her abilities, she successfully drove the violent Leo out of the desert.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - Landing a Critical Hit has a 100% chance to inflict Burn. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

 - Deals additional damage equal to 155% of Magic Attack against targets inflicted with [Burn].

Self

スキル強化効果

basicInfo.name: Yuri
basicInfo.flavor: Using magic for 1,000 years turned Yuri's body blue from the exposure to mana. Her magical powers have definitely grown stronger over the years.
